mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user_profile (email, password, username, address, phone_number, birthday, created_date, last_modified_date, reset_token, reset_token_expiration, provider, provider_id, refresh_token) VALUES (#{email}, #{password}, #{username}, #{address}, #{phoneNumber}, #{birthday}, #{createdDate}, #{lastModifiedDate}, #{resetToken}, #{resetTokenExpiration}, #{provider}, #{providerId}, #{refreshToken})
INSERT INTO login_record_table (user_id, login_time, ip_address, device_info) VALUES (#{userId}, #{loginTime}, #{ipAddress}, #{deviceInfo})
